channel.title: Machine Learning on Akhil’s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Akhil’s Blog

item.title: Designing & Building an Agentic AI framework from scratch
item.description: I’ve seen a lot of people use pre-made agentic frameworks to handle various tasks but I wanted to create a framework from scratch to see the brain, actions, and tools behind these agents.

item.title: Fun with LoRA: How Low-Rank Can We Go Before Adjacency Matrices Break Down?
item.description: VAEs were my introduction to machine learning and I was stuck understanding how we go from linear regression to this. However, I did end up learning a lot on this non-traditional path.

item.title: Why VAEs changed the way I think about modeling
item.description: VAEs were my introduction to machine learning and I was stuck understanding how we go from linear regression to this. However, I did end up learning a lot on this non-traditional path.
